message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product at a special price of $14,000. This is a one-time offer, and I think you'll find it's a great value.
Hello Alice, thanks for the offer, but $14,000 is way too high for me.  I'm interested in the product, but I could only consider a price closer to $6,000.
I understand you're looking for a better price, Bob. However, I have to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll counteroffer at $10,000. This is my best price for now.
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $10,000 is still more than I'm looking to spend.  How about $7,000? That's a fair offer.
I understand you're trying to get the best deal, Bob. I'm willing to compromise further, but I need to make a profit. I'll counteroffer at $9,500. This is my lowest price for now.
Alice, we're getting closer. I can do $7,500. This would be a good deal for me and you would still be making a reasonable profit.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $8,000, but I think I can do better than that. I'll counteroffer at $8,500. This is my final compromise.
